body_html: @prigoyal the THCUNN implementation might or might not expect that some Tensors that you give as input to the backward functions have been run through the forward function. if we do CuDNN forward and THCUNN backward, it wont hold true.
body_text: @prigoyal the THCUNN implementation might or might not expect that some Tensors that you give as input to the backward functions have been run through the forward function. if we do CuDNN forward and THCUNN backward, it wont hold true.
body: @prigoyal the THCUNN implementation might or might not expect that some Tensors that you give as input to the backward functions have been run through the forward function. if we do CuDNN forward and THCUNN backward, it wont hold true.
